name: Stickman Warrior
description:
Demons have invaded your homeland, so you must take arm and fight back!

Controls

  • A and D to move, S to defend
  • Space to attack
  • R to shield slam or kick
  • Q to swap weapon
  • E to throw spear

Tip: Press on dropped spears to pick up.

Features

- 28 level with 8 standard enemy and 5 total boss to defeat.

- You can upgrade your items and hire units to assist during your battle.

- 3 different enemy race.

- Endless levels for fun.

- In game achievements. (itch io doesn't have ach system)

Dev note:

Grew up playing flash games and animations, always wanted to make one myself. This game is heavily inspired by one of the flash game i loved playing. Have fun.
